title: Help with voice activation
content: I have turned on some app that reads aloud everything on my screen. It won't let me access any way to turn it off--everything I try to click on, it just reads. How can I turn this off? I have voice activation turned on, but when I tell it to turn the app off, it doesn't. Someone please help me turn it off!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
